contextEntries.content:
From: manager@company.com
Subject: Q1 Review Meeting - Action Required

Hi Team,

We need to prepare our quarterly presentation for the board meeting this Friday, July 5th. Please ensure all deliverables are ready and the financial summary is included. The presentation should cover:

- Revenue growth metrics
- Project completion status
- Resource allocation
- Q2 planning overview

Please have your sections ready by Thursday EOD for final review.

Best regards,
Sarah Chen
Project Manager

WhatsApp - Family Group:

Mom: "Hey everyone! Planning a family dinner this Saturday at 6 PM. Can someone pick up groceries? We need ingredients for pasta and Caesar salad. Also need to grab some wine for the adults."

Dad: "I can help with groceries if someone sends me a list"

Sister: "I'll make the dessert! Planning to bake chocolate chip cookies"

You: "I can handle the grocery shopping. Will go Saturday morning."

Meeting Notes - Project Planning Session
Date: July 4, 2025
Attendees: Development Team, Product Manager, UX Designer

Key Discussion Points:
- New feature requirements for mobile app
- Timeline: 2 weeks for implementation phase
- Need to schedule weekly team reviews
- User testing feedback integration needed

Action Items:
1. Create detailed project roadmap by Monday
2. Set up development environment for new features
3. Schedule user interview sessions
4. Review and update UI/UX mockups
5. Estimate resource requirements for Q3

Next Meeting: Tuesday 10 AM

From: dentist@healthcareplus.com
Subject: Appointment Reminder

Dear Patient,

This is a reminder that you have a dental cleaning appointment scheduled for:

Date: Friday, July 5th, 2025
Time: 2:00 PM
Location: HealthCare Plus Dental
123 Main Street, Suite 200

Please arrive 15 minutes early for check-in. If you need to reschedule, please call us at (555) 123-4567.

Thank you,
HealthCare Plus Dental Team

Slack - #dev-team channel:

John: "The API integration for the payment system is almost complete. Just need to handle the webhook validation."

Alice: "Great! I've finished the frontend components. When can we test the full flow?"

Manager: "Let's aim for Monday testing. Make sure all edge cases are covered."

John: "Will do. I'll create a test plan document this weekend."

Alice: "Perfect. I'll also write up the user acceptance criteria."

Personal Learning Goals - July 2025

Books to Read:
1. "The Lean Startup" by Eric Ries (Priority: Medium)
2. "Clean Code" by Robert Martin (Priority: High)
3. "System Design Interview" by Alex Xu (Priority: Medium)

Online Courses:
- Complete React Advanced Patterns course
- Finish AWS Solutions Architect certification
- Learn TypeScript advanced features

Side Projects:
- Build personal portfolio website
- Contribute to open source projects
- Create a mobile app prototype

Progress Notes:
- Currently 30% through "The Lean Startup"
- React course: 6/12 modules completed
- Portfolio website: design phase

From: gym@fitnessplus.com
Subject: Weekly Workout Schedule

Hi Fitness Enthusiast,

Your personal trainer has updated your workout schedule for this week:

Monday: Upper body strength training (7 AM)
Wednesday: Cardio and core workout (7 AM)
Friday: Full body HIIT session (7 AM)
Saturday: Yoga and stretching (9 AM)

Remember to bring your water bottle and towel. If you need to reschedule any session, please give us at least 2 hours notice.

Stay strong!
Fitness Plus Team

Text Message - Friend Group:

Alex: "Movie night this Sunday? There's a new thriller everyone's talking about."

Samantha: "I'm in! What time?"

Mike: "Sounds great. My place or cinema?"

You: "Cinema sounds good. How about the 7 PM show?"

Alex: "Perfect! I'll book tickets for 7 PM. IMAX or regular?"

Samantha: "IMAX for the full experience!"

Mike: "Agreed. See everyone Sunday!"

extractedTasks.title: Prepare Q1 quarterly presentation
extractedTasks.description: Create comprehensive presentation for board meeting covering revenue growth, project status, resource allocation, and Q2 planning

extractedTasks.title: Buy groceries for family dinner
extractedTasks.description: Purchase pasta ingredients, Caesar salad components, and wine for Saturday family dinner

extractedTasks.title: Create project roadmap
extractedTasks.description: Develop detailed roadmap for new mobile app features based on team meeting discussions

extractedTasks.title: Attend dental appointment
extractedTasks.description: Dental cleaning appointment at HealthCare Plus Dental

extractedTasks.title: Continue reading The Lean Startup
extractedTasks.description: Progress through learning goals, currently 30% complete

suggestions.message: Block 3-4 hours Thursday morning for presentation preparation when you're most productive
Combine grocery shopping with other errands to maximize efficiency
Consider assigning team members specific sections of the project roadmap based on their expertise
Schedule breaks between high-priority work tasks to maintain focus and productivity

howToUse: Copy individual context entries from the contextEntries array
Paste them into the Context Input page of the application
Use different source types (email, message, note) to test categorization
Process with AI to see how the system extracts tasks and generates suggestions
Compare AI output with expectedAIInsights to validate functionality
testScenarios: Test mixed priority tasks in single context session
